name: GROUP-864 TRAINING PROGRAM
description:
Greetings, new recruit! Here at GROUP-864, we specialize in studying creatures and analyzing data about beings that the public ought not know about for their own good!

In this training module, you'll be introduced to five of the core aspects of being a GROUP-864 (RANK 3) INDIVIDUAL. Don't forget to have fun and, smile, most importantly, don't die!

This is an analogue horror video game set in a universe similar to the SCP foundation's world. Except you are training for your new job working there! Good luck! Break a leg (but not literally hopefully)... "Never being lost." ;)
